name: bilaterally

in a way that involves two groups or countries: We will work bilaterally to build open trade relationships. Much of the trading is done bilaterally between the two parties via email. See

More examplesFewer examplesMany trade deals are still conducted bilaterally.They need to solve this issue bilaterally through dialogue.Multilateralism is where a group of countries negotiate trade and payments arrangements, rather than dealing bilaterally.
